title: Zeit Verbrechen
overview: In four films, four outstanding directors explore the limits and possibilities of the (true) crime genre. Each inspired by an episode of the podcast "Zeit Verbrechen", which is one of the most listened to and successful podcasts in Germany with around five million streams a month, Helene Hegemann, Faraz Shariat, Mariko Minoguchi and Jan Bonny direct four radical and extraordinary crime films that go beyond genre conventions.
